original: Bergstrand, Carl-Martin, arkivarie, Göteborg, f. 21/2/99 i Värsås, Skarab. 1., av kyrkoh. Waldemar B. o. Amanda Törnsten. G. 27 m. Ester Svensson. — Studiex. v. Gbgs h. latin 18, fil. kand. i Lund 25, fil. lic. där 30. Lär. v. folksk. 20-23, v. folkhögsk. 26-29, förest, f. Västsv. foilkminneisarkivet i Gbg sed. 32. Sekr. i inst. f. foik-minnesforskn. v. Gbgs högsk. sed. 32, dito i Västsv. folkminnesfören. 32. Skr. I Två knalle socknars krönika, Toarp o. Rångedala 1700-1850 (32) Trolldom o. klokskap i Västergötl. (32), Kulturbilder fr. 1700-talets Västergötl. (del I-III 33-35), Kulturbilder fr. 1700-talets Bohusl. (37), Tat-tarplågan (42), Västgötasägner (44), Våra gamla berätta (44), art. i Folkminnen o. Folktankar, Hembygden, Vår bygd, Vikarvet m. fl. publ.
translated: Bergstrand, Carl-Martin, archivist, Gothenburg, born February 21, 1899 in Värsås, Skaraborg County, the first child of the Reverend Waldemar B. and Amanda Törnsten. Married in 1927 to Ester Svensson. He obtained his high school diploma in Latin in Gothenburg in 1918, and his Bachelor's degree in Philosophy in Lund in 1925, and his Licentiate in Philosophy there in 1930. He taught at a primary school from 1920-1923 and at a folk high school from 1926-1929, and then became the director of Västsv. folk memory archive in Gothenburg starting in 1932. He was also secretary of the institution for folk memory research at Gothenburg University since 1932 and also held the same position at Västsv. folk memory association starting in 1932. He wrote the chronicles of Two Peddlers' Parishes as well as Toarp and Rångedala 1700-1850 (1932), Witchcraft and Healing in Västergötland (1932), Cultural Pictures from 18th century Västergötland (part I-III 1933-1935), Cultural Pictures from Bohuslän in the 18th century (1937), The Gypsy Plague (1942), Legends of Västergötland (1944), Our Old Tales (1944), articles in Folklore and Folk Thoughts, Home Country, Our Village, Vikarvet, and other publications.

memberOf.name: Institution for Folk Memory Research at Gothenburg University

publication.name: Cultural Pictures from 18th century Västergötland (part I-III)
